00034 class SerializationBuffer;
00035 class DeserializationBuffer;
00036 
00046 enum GCPlacement {
00047     UseGC, 
00048     NoGC, 
00049     PointerFreeGC 
00052 };
00053 
00064 class Object {
00065 #ifndef SYLPH_DOXYGEN
00066 public:
00067     Object();
00068     virtual ~Object();
00069     void* operator new( size_t size);
00070     void* operator new( size_t size, GCPlacement gcp);
00071     void* operator new( size_t size, void *p);
00072     void operator delete( void* obj);
00073     void operator delete( void*, GCPlacement);
00074     void operator delete( void*, void*);
00075 
00076     // Arrays from Object are *never* gc'ed, and I recommend using Sylph::Array
00077     // instead. Maybe we should document this somewhere?
00078     void* operator new[](size_t size);
00079     void* operator new[](size_t size, void *p);
00080     void operator delete[](void* obj);
00081     void operator delete[](void*, void*);
00082 
00083 private:
00084     static void cleanup(void* obj, void* clientData);
00085 #endif
00086 public:
00092     virtual void serialize(SerializationBuffer & buf) const;
00098     virtual void deserialize(DeserializationBuffer & buf);
00099 };
